attributes.action: Give undocumented migrants free NHS Covid19 treatment and temporary legal status
attributes.additional_details:
Undocumented migrants live in the black economy, no taxes are paid and exploitation thrive. Slavery booms, crimes go unreported, a dark side only found in failed states now in our backyard.If parliament grants temporary legal status these will nightmare will end instantly. Migrants dying; Independent 18 Apr. Millions might starve; Guardian 2 Mar.
Prime Minister supports amnesty for migrants; https://iasservices.org.uk/the-amnesty-debate-should-the-uk-give-undocumented-migrants-the-right-to-stay/
attributes.background: A migrant died of Covid in his room as he had no documents, was broke and scared of the NHS. His wife has Covid-19 symptoms too.Many are in this inhumane, degrading dilemma and will make controlling of Covid worse. They need temporary legal status to work, pay tax, go to NHS and have dignified life

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions which call for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307321
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301696
